name: GetStoreOrdersInfo
description:
Retrieve information about a store's orders via Mailchimp.

Use this tool to get detailed information about the orders of a specified store from Mailchimp's ecommerce platform.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store whose orders information is to be retrieved.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Use dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_order_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of order fields to exclude, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: number_of_records_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return, between 1 and 1000, with a default of 10.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination. Default is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: filter_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders made by a specific customer using their unique customer ID.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders made by a specific customer.

parameters.name: restrict_to_outreach_orders
parameters.description: Indicate whether to restrict results to orders with an outreach attached, such as an email campaign or Facebook ad. Accepts 'true' or 'false'.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders that have an outreach attached. For example, an email campaign or Facebook ad.

parameters.name: restrict_to_campaign_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders with the specified `campaign_id`.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific `campaign_id` value.

parameters.name: specific_outreach_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific outreach ID.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific `outreach_id` value.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

value_schema.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this is the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders made by a specific customer.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders made by a specific customer.

parameters.name: has_outreach
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders that have an outreach attached. For example, an email campaign or Facebook ad.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders that have an outreach attached. For example, an email campaign or Facebook ad.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific `campaign_id` value.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific `campaign_id` value.

parameters.name: outreach_id
parameters.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific `outreach_id` value.

value_schema.description: Restrict results to orders with a specific `outreach_id` value.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
